Package org.apache.sling.scripting.jsp.taglib

Class ForwardTagHandler

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
org.apache.sling.scripting.jsp.taglib.AbstractDispatcherTagHandler
org.apache.sling.scripting.jsp.taglib.ForwardTagHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
public class ForwardTagHandler extends AbstractDispatcherTagHandler
The ForwardTagHandler implements the <sling:forward> custom tag.
